properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:10PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Alabama River At
Montgomery...R.F. Henry Lock and Dam...and Selma...

.Heavy rainfall over the past 2 days continues to produce rises along
the Alabama River. Minor flooding is forecast to continue along the
river for the next few days.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Alabama River At Selma.
* from Thursday morning until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* AT 7 PM Tuesday the stage was 43.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 45 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Thursday morning and continue
to rise to near 46.9 feet by early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 45 feet...Extensive overflow of low lying lands
in the area begins. Some low roads in the area begin to flood. At
30 feet...Pasture lands below Selma become flooded.
* Impact...At 48 feet...Flooding occurs inland to between Johnson
Street and Old Montgomery Road in Selmont. Portions of Bloch Park
and the Selma Country Club begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
